title: Bonus Episode – Proving Innocence After Pleading Guilty
description:
July 3, 2018 / Susan and Colin explore state statues that preclude defendant who have pled guilty from seeking to prove their actual innocence.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This bonus episode was sponsored by Quip and Quicken Loans.

www.GetQuip.com/undisclosed 

www.RocketMortgage.com/undisclosed 

#undisclosed
